channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260125)
item.description:
What's New

docs: Update README with Translation feature and new version 1.2.20

  • Update version badge from 1.2.19 to 1.2.20
  • Add new Translation feature section (Section 9)
  • Document 3 translation providers: Google, Tencent Transmart, Volcano Engine
  • Add Translation to highlights with 30+ supported languages
  • Update project structure to include Translation/ directory
  • Update section numbering (Input Sources → 10, Window Rules → 11, Others → 12)
  • Add new files: DebugLogger.swift, TranslationLanguage.swift to Shared
  • Fix broken emoji characters

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
